problem.markdown:
>>Q1. JAL instruction uses PC-relative addressing.<< ()True ()False
>>Q2. JALR instruction uses register indirect addressing mode.<< ()True ()False
>>Q3. JAL instruction stores the return address after the procedure call on the stack.<< ()True ()False
>>Q4. It is possible to use a register other than Return Address Save Register (R31) to store the return address.<< ()True ()False
>>Q5. It is possibe to pass parameters to a function using memory locations in data section.<< ()True ()False
problem.p: Q1. JAL instruction uses PC-relative addressing.

choicegroup.label: Q1. JAL instruction uses PC-relative addressing.

problem.p: Q2. JALR instruction uses register indirect addressing mode.

choicegroup.label: Q2. JALR instruction uses register indirect addressing mode.

problem.p: Q3. JAL instruction stores the return address after the procedure call on the stack.

choicegroup.label: Q3. JAL instruction stores the return address after the procedure call on the stack.

problem.p: Q4. It is possible to use a register other than Return Address Save Register (R31) to store the return address.

choicegroup.label: Q4. It is possible to use a register other than Return Address Save Register (R31) to store the return address.

problem.p: Q5. It is possibe to pass parameters to a function using memory locations in data section.
